text: Ottobeuren (Swabian: Ottobeire, Medieval Latin: Ottobura) is a market town and municipality in Bavaria, Germany, placed 11 km southeast of Memmingen near the A7. The town is seat of a municipal association with Hawangen and Böhen. ==Twin towns — sister cities== Ottobeuren is twinned with: * Norcia, Italy * Saint-Donat-sur-l'Herbasse, France * Tenterfield, New South Wales, Australia ==References== Category:Unterallgäu
title: Ottobeuren
